summary:
O'Hare Airport is a big, busy airport in Chicago, Illinois. It's about 17 miles from the city center and covers a large area of 7,627 acres. The airport has flights to many places worldwide, making it one of the most connected airports globally. It's the fourth busiest airport in the United States and serves as a hub for American and United Airlines.

Originally an airfield for airplane manufacturing during World War II, it later became Chicago's main airport, known for its innovative design. O'Hare was once the world's busiest airport and still ranks high today. You can reach it easily by road or public transport.
title: O'Hare International Airport
